opening.title: Brew Persian tea
opening.description: 5 TBSP of tea in filter. Brew twice, then turn on the warmer

subtasks.title: Brew medium roast.
subtasks.description: Use 250g of beans and 1 gallon of water

subtasks.title: Brew dark roast.
subtasks.description: Use 220g of beans and 1 gallon of water

subtasks.title: Purge wands and clean solution out of jugs.
Adjust grind until 17-19g of coffee take 28 to 34 sec to pull
